thoughts.text: I found some good resources for learning Spanish. I think I should start by choosing one of these resources and starting to learn the language.
thoughts.reasoning: I have found some good resources for learning Spanish, so it makes sense to start using one of them to begin learning the language.
thoughts.plan:
- Choose a resource to use for learning Spanish
- Start using the resource to learn the language
- Practice speaking and writing in Spanish
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I stay motivated and consistent in my language learning.
thoughts.speak: I found some good resources for learning Spanish. I think I should start by choosing one of these resources and starting to learn the language.

args.question: What are the best resources for learning Spanish?
